tak jako první bod bych chtel rict ze to je hra ktera me docela zaujala svim zhledem, no 

tak jako druhy bod bych vam chtel rict ze tam hrajete za holku s jmenem karolina ktera ma oranzovi teplaky coz je pro me velkej minus protoze namam rat oranzovou, a dal tam je takova pani ktera je robot neboli umnela intelichence slozena z treba kovu, no a pak tam je jeste dalsi robot kterej je nejdriv hodnej a pak je hodne zlej, jo ja malem bych zapomnel tel prvni robot je veskutecnosi jen pouha brambora ktera je obalená ruznym materialem kteri z ni dela toho robota :-) je navase ta brambora nejdriv zla ale pak s vama zachrani tovarnu aprcrsajnc a budete dobri kamaratky jelikoz jak uz jsem zminil tak obe jste holky teda karolina je holka ale brambora s menem glados je sklonovana na zensky rod podle toho co jsem se predevcirem naucil kdyz jsme mnely na suplovani pani ucitelku z 5.C 

tak jako treti bod bych chtel upozornit aby jste si druhy bod necetli jestly jste nehraly hru az do konce nebod se v druhem bode vyskytuje ''vykecani pribehu'' takzvany spojler

tak jako paty bod bych vam chtel jen zdelit ze tam jsou levly ktery jsou tezky ja jsem dal prvnich pet levlu sam a kdyz jsem dostal tu zbran ktera strili na bili zdi fialovi a oranzovi fleky tak uz mi musela pomoct mamka nibrz jsem to dal nezvladnul dokoncit ona rikala ze to bylo tesky tak ja ji verim a rikam taky ze to bylo tezkky 

myslim ze by ste to nemneli hrat pokavat nemate chytrou mamu jako mam ja 

cenove je podle me hra prijatelna jsem sem na ni usetril za pouhy jeden stedry den

tak pak bych tedy rad jeste ohodnotil vzhled a pribech a vubec celou hru ale ja musim jit na stolni tenis tak cau a uzite si hru 

jo a jeste muj strejda pavel je nezadany, on by chtel prej nejakou holku mezi 12-16 roky tak se mu prosim ozvete na email : kokochkin36@strejdapavel.cz

Great Game!!
Helps you get invested into the characters and plot, just by listening to them.
My favourite character is Wheatley, because he seems like the average side-kick, but he turns evil and helps more character progression for GLaDOS to be made.

Portal 2 has some of the most brilliantly funny writing I've seen in a game. Wheatley is hysterical and even if the game was bad I would recommend it for that reason alone. But Portal 2 is also one of the most brilliant games I've ever played. Do yourself a favor and get this game. I recommend starting with Portal, but it's not necessary.

序章
**先说理性的**
我今天又把传送门1、2玩了一遍
考虑到这是两款分别在2007年、2011年发行的游戏
在人工智能理念先锋性、游戏创意、关卡设计、画面、剧情和游戏引擎上都是接近完美的
特别是关卡设计的难易梯度极为合理
虽然没有严格意义上的新手指引但是玩家在不知不觉中就逐步的变强了
可能只有塞尔达能与之一比
同时所衍生出的小说、漫画、视频也是极为丰富的
时至今日还有不少游戏在致敬这个游戏的元素
我把Portal系列的赞美之词都写在这里吧
毕竟有生之年都不一定能玩到Portal 3了

**说说感性的**
第1章
你能想象
一个主角全程不说话
有且只有两个机器人为数不多（？）的台词
核心玩法是密室逃脱的游戏
获得年度剧情大奖吗？
第2章
浪漫的GLaDOS
浪漫的人工智能
我能想到的关于人工智能的样子都在这个游戏里了
也许我到达不了这一天
但我已经见过了
第3章
GLaDOS是个傲娇女王
GLaDOS完全藐视人类
虽然最后她对Chell产生了一丝“敬意”
但是这丝毫影响不了自己对“人工智能”这个身份的自豪感
实验是她的使命和终极追求
第4章
Chell是个哑巴（？）
我相信Chell心中的感情是极为复杂的
恨嘛，人家只是人工智能，有点恨不起来，而且也算是半个Caroline
爱嘛，更扯不上了，毕竟是杀亲仇人
第5章
相濡以沫，不如相忘于江湖
金风玉露一相逢，便胜却人间无数
就让这种相爱相杀在这里结束吧
写到这里突然感觉有没有Portal 3也无所谓了
心里有些空，却又感觉很满足
第6章
这里附上 Portal 2 片尾曲《Want You Gone》以及歌词。
GLaDOS为Chell而唱，算是为这唯一的对手/朋友践行吧

还记得你有两次试图杀死我吗？
Oh how we laughed and laughed

Except I wasn't laughing
只是我没有笑

在此情形中
I've been shockingly nice
我的状态还真不错

你想要自由？拿去
That's what I'm counting on
这正是我所期待的
I used to want you dead but
过去我希望你死，但是
Now I only want you gone
现在我只希望你离开
Music...She was a lot like you
她看上去还真像你
Maybe not quite as heavy
或许没有你这般重N
ow little Caroline is in here too

I'll let you get right to it

再见，我唯一的朋友

哦，你以为我是指你吗？

This is starting to gain dust, but I think that this is a masterpiece. It's no longer a mod-like addon to Half-Life 2. It's grown up with an amazing story, and it's ready to hit you with genius puzzles and gameplay.

Really amazing sequel to the first game. The story gets even more focus, but in the right ways, it's a big part of the game and what drives it, but at the same time, the puzzle solving aspect is what makes it unique. Every time you learn a new concept, it carries over into the next chamber to layer on with the previous concepts and the new ones. Overall, best silent protagonist I've ever played as. Best robot characters because of their humorous moments. GLaDOS is witty but compasionate in a more robotic way. She is a robot with a touch of human in her. Overall 9/10 game.

What I will critque the game for are the plot holes in the game. If you pay attention, you will find them. Sometimes games break their own rules just to make the rest of it happen. This game is no exception. That's what keeps it from being 10/10.

There are some games out there that scream "greatest FPS ever" or "greatest sim ever" or "greatest strategy ever" or "greatest [enter genre here] ever."

Portal 2 is, in my most humble of opinions, the greatest frickin' GAME ever. Well, perhaps that is too broad and general of a thing to say but still, my feelings about this game are difficult to describe.

The puzzles are awesome and significantly harder than the original Portal.
The voice acting is some of the best ever and EXTREMELY funny! Aside from 'South Park the Stick of Truth' I have never laughed this much playing a game before!

For those who enjoyed the original Portal but didn't like how short the game is this one will not disappoint. I would say this one is around 4 or more times longer than the original. There is so much more to do and Valve did such a superb job with the music and the writing.

This is a must-play for anyone that likes to play games or have a laugh.
A major improvement over the first game. Stunning graphics, better story and new mechanics.
Amazing game. Challenging, interesting, exciting puzzles combined with an amazing storyline. Definitely play portal 1 & 2.

This is one of the best classic games. 

Portal was one of the best games for its periode and it is perfect even now. However, they somehow managed to make it even better in this version. The game contains a very entertaining story about enemies being forced to work together and betrayal. One of the best games in the world. I highly recommend to buy it and tell your friends to buy it too. This game, unlike portal, contains a cooperative mode, which has a very good story, however, not as good as the singleplayer mode. The puzzles ion this game are very challenging and good, but they are even better in the cooperative mode. 

Conclusion: Buy it. It´s one of the best games ever. It´s a shame they will not release a new game in this series.

想了很久决定写下这个测评，刚接触steam的时候是因为gta，刚上大学室友居然也玩steam，那时候传送门打折我和室友买了一个，我和他单人都没打就开始双人合作，非常的欢快，但经常卡关，曾一度多次想弃游，可能是我思想江化吧，但每次都是室友带我通关，他一个人想我跟着去做，陆陆续续一个月游戏也通关了，却再也没有碰过。

                                                                                                                                                                                                               没想到时间过的很快，我已经大三了，我即将也要走向社会，奔波于命运，但在我校园生活快结束的时候我很幸运又碰见了一个很好的玩伴，我们又一起玩上了传送门，她就像当年的我，我来领导，她来施行，真的很开心，很有趣，即使素未谋面。但是她成了我最好的朋友，在大学三年因为打游戏我失去了许多在现实活动的时间，也成了别人口中的死宅，虽然牺牲了很多。但是回忆起这一段记忆还是很快乐的吧。  
                                                                                                                                                                                  每个游戏都有一个自己难忘的故事和回忆，我谢谢传送门和steam给我带来的欢乐和回忆，希望以后我还能开开心心的玩steam认识到更多的玩伴

Ahh, Portal 2. A adventurous but extremely rewarding reboot of it's predecessor, Portal. I've recently picked up the game as my friends were telling me to play it after I told them I didn't have it. I can certainly say that I am 100% satisfied with my purchase. Portal 2 is an amazing game.
------------
Graphics
------------
Portal 2 has amazing graphics for its time. Not only does the game run good on max settings, but it looks fine detailed and crisp as well.
------------
Gameplay
------------
Portal 2 has about the same gameplay as its predecessor but handles it in a more creative, confident way. The level design is much more intricate with harder puzzles you have to solve and if you lke that genre, the game feels amazing.
------------
Bugs
------------
There were no bugs in the time that I had played it except for it crashing on start, but all I had to do was reboot Steam in offline mode, and go back online again, and it fixed. This only happened to me once during my time playing this game.
------------
TL;DR
------------
If you like the puzzle genre and are sick of games handeling it the same boring old way, Portal 2 is here for you. It is a fantastic game from its graphics to its gameplay. Overall, this game is fantastic, and a well deserving sequel to the original.
Masterpiece.

Great story, but short and slightly repetetive. Otherwise great and totally worth buying together with Portal 1.

Крутая и интерестная игра с множеством головоломок в самой игре и на картах из сообщества.Мультиплеер хороший.Сюжет инересный, синглплеер тоже ничего. В сообществе нахоятся такие которые делают карты сложнее чем авторы игры. Valve сделала редактор карт для изучения физики и ради того чтобы посмотреть какие головоломки придумают школьники (т. к. Valve их пригласили в "штаб" ради этого).

                                                                  КАЖДОМУ

                                                                    СЫГРАТЬ

I LOVE the writing in this game. Hilarious and engaging story / characters with fun gameplay and puzzle design to back it up. 10/10, Favourite game of all time

Loved it. Absolutely loved it.
And I bet you will too.
It's filled to the brim with adventure, witty humor, plot, amazing use (or rather, lack of use) of physics, and so much more. I can't even express just how truly incredible this game is. Definitely reccomend it to anyone interested, but I do suggest playing the first game in the series.
This series is to die for.

One of the best games ever. It is truly unique in that it has a riveting story, matched with fun and interactive gameplay that delivers an achievable challenge. My only complaint is that there isnt a Portal 3 out yet. There is so much depth to this game and it is especially apparant when you look over into the Half-Life side too. Definetly worth the buy.
Like the first but even better.
